text: today I'm going to show you an amazingly
simple trick in which you can embellish
and decorate cakes with pastry tips the
first tip I have for you is super simple
and all you really need is a standard
leaf tip so you want to make sure that
you hold the tip horizontal to your work
surface apply pressure release the
pressure and pull the tip away so
pressure stop pull away the next tip is
a standard straight petal tip with this
you can create flowers or roses and what
you are going to need is a flower nail
take a little bit of frosting place that
right on the top here and a little piece
of parchment paper stick it right on the
top now you can just take off the
coupler and pipe out a little bit of
buttercream right in the center here I'm
going to balance it off to the side
while I reapply the tip and now starting
again with the wide end with the tip
facing down pipe out your frosting and
turn the nail using your other two
fingers you create these little petals
or half circles so keep going around and
gradually you're going to work your way
down to the base this is when you're
going to angle your bag down slightly
and build up the flower so there you go
you have something that looks like a
beautiful rose and this is a really easy
way to embellish your cupcakes enjoy
this guy's I know you're going to have
really great success in decorating your
cake
